metadata.title: CVE-2022-27166 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: A carefully crafted request on XHRHtml2Markup.jsp could trigger an XSSvulnerability on Apache JSPWiki up to and including 2.11.2, which couldallow the attacker to execute javascript in the victim's browser and getsome sensitive information about the victim.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
